    • update

      public void update(float deltaTime)
      Update function to be called by main game loop. Handles preparation phase timer and enemy spawning.
      Parameters:
      deltaTime - time elapsed since last update in seconds

      public void spawnEnemyDebug(int laneNumber, RobotFactory.RobotType robotType)
      A function to allow debug commands to spawn a specific enemy type Unlike the regular spawnEnemy function, this does not update the position in the wave
      Parameters:
      laneNumber - The lane to spawn the enemy in
      robotType - The robot type to spawn
